DOC.brief_summary: Screen for moderate to severe asthma patients with suboptimal asthma control (as defined by GINA-Guidelines). Document current asthma control status. Re-evaluate asthma therapy and document new therapy if applicable.
DOC.brief_title: Be SMART NIS, Moderate to Servere Asthma Patient Observation
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe asthma with suboptimal control Intermittent or mild asthma, patient with good asthma control
